validate: if (B1.r1.c1 and B1.r2.c1) or (B1.r1.c2 and B1.r2.c2) or (B1.r1.c5 and B1.r2.c5) : error("Sorry, but that answer combination contradicts itself – please make sure your answers for each statement are different")

text.label: S3a
text.title: Please enter your postcode:

radio.label: S4a
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your personal annual household income, before tax?

radio.label: S4b
radio.title: And which of the following best describes your total annual household income, before tax?
radio.validate: if not(S4a.r99) and (S4b.val < S4a.val) : error("Household Income must be equal or greater than Personal income.")

number.label: D10_[loopvar: label]
number.title:
[loopvar: concept]
Based on this description and your own expectations on what you think it would cost, at what price would this product be for a [loopvar: pack_size]
number.comment: Please enter a whole number for each.
number.validate: if (D10_[loopvar: label].r2.val) <= (D10_[loopvar: label].r1.val) or (D10_[loopvar: label].r3.val) <= (D10_[loopvar: label].r2.val) or (D10_[loopvar: label].r4.val) <= (D10_[loopvar: label].r3.val): error("First value is less than Second value, Second value is less than Third value and Third value is less than Fourth value. Please check your input values.")
number.row: Too cheap that you would question the quality
Starting to get expensive but still worth buying
Too expensive and not worth buying

number.label: C_PplInHH
number.title: Including yourself, how many people are currently living in your household?

number.label: C_AgeRangesInHH
number.title: Including yourself, how many people are currently living in your household in each of the following age ranges?
number.validate: if (this.r1.val or 0)+(this.r2.val or 0)+(this.r3.val or 0)+(this.r4.val or 0)!=C_PplInHH.val: error("THE TOTAL NUMBER OF PEOPLE IN YOUR HOUSEHOLD MUST MATCH THE RESPONSES GIVEN TO THE AGE RANGES") if (this.r1 or 0) lt 1: error("THERE MUST BE AT LEAST ONE PERSON 18 AND OVER LIVING IN YOUR HOUSEHOLD")
